pageTitle: Itinerary for Tuesday, September 26, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Tuesday, September 26, 2017:

Ottawa, Ontario

9:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Cabinet Meeting.

Note for media:

  • Ministers will be available to media in the House of Commons Foyer as of 12:00 p.m.

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend Question Period.

4:00 p.m. The Prime Minister and the Minister of Science, Kirsty Duncan, will make an announcement. A media availability will follow.

Foyer
Centre Block
Parliament Hill

Note for media:

  • Open coverage

4:40 p.m. The Prime Minister will host a student science fair.

Office of the Prime Minister and Privy Council
80 Wellington Street

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity

Media Appearance

An interview with the Prime Minister will air on CBCâ€™s This Hour has 22 Minutes.
